verses.roman:
prabhu kahe, kulīnagrāmera ye haya kukkura
sei mora priya, anya jana rahu dūra

synonyms: prabhu—the Lord; kahe—says; kulīna-grāmera—of the village of Kulīna-grāma; ye—anyone who; haya—becomes; kukkura—even a dog; sei—he; mora—My; priya—dear; anya—others; jana—persons; rahu—let them remain; dūra—away.
translation: The Lord said, "What to speak of others, even a dog in the village of Kulīna-grāma is My dear friend.
